item.title: React Query
item.description: Fetch, cache and update data in React applications

item.title: UI component libraries for React
item.description: Material UI Material UI is the most popular UI component library out there. You can theme Material UI so that it doesn’t look like yet another project designed with Material Design. There’s a store with several free and paid themes to choose from. One particularly good looking theme is Soft UI Dashboard React by Creative Tim. Chakra UI Chakra UI is the new kid on the block, but where it lacks in maturity it makes up for in ease of use.
